context.description:
This operator acts as a Kafka consumer receiving messages for one or more topics. Note that there may be multiple threads receiving messages depending on the configuration specified. Ordering of messages is not guaranteed.
**Behavior in a Consistent Region** This operator cannot be used inside a consistent region.

parameter.name: kafkaProperty
parameter.description: Specify a Kafka property "key=value" form. This will override any property specified in the properties file.

parameter.name: keyAttribute
parameter.description: Name of the attribute for the key. Default is "key"

parameter.name: messageAttribute
parameter.description: Name of the attribute for the message. This attribute is required. Default is "message"

parameter.name: propertiesFile
parameter.description: Properties file containing kafka properties. Properties file is recommended to be stored in the etc directory. If a relative path is specified, the path is relative to the application directory.

parameter.name: threadsPerTopic
parameter.description: Number of threads per topic. Default is 1.

outputPortSet.description: Messages received from Kafka are sent on this output port.
